name: PEPS Coin
description: Think Amazon, think eBay, think of the freedom to use your PEPS coin to buy any good or service as you see fit. Basically, we will create a community where you can buy and sell anything you want. PEPS is a payment platform and marketplace that is used in addition to blockchain technology to provide anyone with a way to connect cryptocurrencies to the real economy. Hence, providing longevity and value to you!
